alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:31PM CDT until September 21 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NUCKOLLS AND NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rosemont, or 21 miles south of Hastings, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lawrence and Rosemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
